1.0.name: wordpress/thirdpresence
1.0.description:
1. Enter the [thirdpresence video="videoid" /] into any post. The parameter "videoid" is the id number of the video.
  2. When the post is accessed, a thumbnail image of the video will be displayed inline with the rest of the article.
  3. By clicking on the thumbnail, the video will play on the mobile device.

More detailed instructions can be found from Thirdpresence Wiki
